description: This file contains a script that sets up a financial analysis agent using the 'agno' framework, including imports, agent configuration, and example prompts for market analysis.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with specific models, tools, and instructions for financial analysis.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for interfacing with OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: ThinkingTools
classes.description: Tools for enhancing the agent with reasoning capabilities.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Tools for fetching financial data from Yahoo Finance.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to send a prompt to the agent and print the response, optionally streaming.
